casebody.data:
Jeffrey F. GOSTYLA
v.
Bryan CHAMBERS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 3, 2018

Martin McQuillan, in support of the petition.

John W. Mills, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 506, 171 A.3d 98 (2017), is denied.
